The HOME page
Welcome to the Kuwana International Center. Our aim is to help you get by and around in Japan.
The center is open Monday to Saturday from 9 to 5. We offer services in English, Portuguese, Japanese and Spanish.

If you want to contact us, please goto the Contact Us page and send us an email, otherwise you can call us on (+81) (0) 594 22 8333.

The ABOUT page
With the great increase of foreigners in the province of Mie, where many do not know the language, and others are too busy to learn, we saw the necessity of a place to assist people in the area.
This agency isn't currently linked with the government but rather with a Japanese company that have an active interest in the community, including the foreigner community here in Kuwana. Seeing the great growth of the foreign community, this company decided to invest money into services provided for the community at bare, cost rates.
At the Center, we render all of our services to everyone in the foreign community as well as possible, and we will supply the best information we can about the surrounding areas of Kuwana. Moreover, we want everyone to have the opportunity to learn Japanese (in reading, writing and conversation), and to make the most out of their experiences here.
We also offer the following:
Private and commerical real estate - for sale and for rent; and
International trading of goods between Japan, China, Brazil and Peru. See the trade homepage for more information.
